ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I tried to limit the amount I drank
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I tried to resist the opportunity to start drinking
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I tried to slow down my drinking
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I tried to cut down my drinking (i.e. drink less)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I tried to stop drinking for a period of time
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I found it difficult to limit the amount I drank
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I started drinking even after deciding not to
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... Even when I intended having only one or two drinks, I ended up having many more
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I was able to cut down my drinking (i.e.. drink less) when I wanted to
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I started drinking at times when I knew it would cause me problems (e.g. problems at work, with family/friends or with the police, etc.)
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I was able to stop drinking easily after one or two drinks
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I was able to stop drinking before becoming completely drunk
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I had an irresistible urge to resist drinking, even for a single day
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I found it difficult to resist drinking, even for a single day
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: During the last 6 months... I was able to slow down my drinking when I wanted to
Notes: 1= Never; 2= Rarely; 3= Sometimes; 4= Often; 5= Always; -99 = Not applicable

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I would find it difficult to limit the amount I drink
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I would start to drink, even after deciding not to
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: Even if I intended having only one or two drinks, I would end up having many more
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I could cut down on my drink (i.e., drink less) if I wanted to
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I would start drinking at times when I knew it would cause me problems
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I could stop drinking easily after one or two drinks
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I could stop drinking before becoming completely drunk
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I would have an irresistible urge to continue drinking once I started
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I would find it difficult to resist drinking, even for a single day
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: What do you think would happen with your drinking now: I could slow down my drinking if I wanted to
Notes: 1 = Strongly disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Undecided; 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Score for Part 1: Attempted Control
Score for Part 2: Failed Control
Score for Part 3: Perceived Control
